abstract: Chinese investors approached Alberta Investment Management to consider a joint counterbid for Potash of Saskatchewan, the Canadian pension fund’s chief executive officer said.
snippet: Chinese investors approached Alberta Investment Management to consider a joint counterbid for Potash of Saskatchewan, the Canadian pension fund’s chief executive officer said.
lead_paragraph: Chinese investors approached Alberta Investment Management to consider a joint counterbid for Potash of Saskatchewan, the Canadian pension fund’s chief executive officer said, according to Bloomberg News.

headline.main: China Said to Approach Alberta Fund to Block BHP
